amendments.title: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 39 the Miller (MI) amendment printed in House Report 113-2 is considered as adopted.
To require that any debt limit increase be balanced by equal spending cuts over the next decade.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 6 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 6.

amendments.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for automatic continuing resolutions.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 7 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.

amendments.title: To protect Social Security benefits and military pay and require that the United States Government prioritize all obligations on the debt held by the public in the event that the debt limit is reached.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 8.

amendments.title: To prohibit the sale, lease, transfer, retransfer, or delivery of F-16 aircraft, M1 tanks, or certain other defense articles or services to the Government of Egypt.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 9 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 19. Record Vote Number: 9.
